content.heading: Regulatory Compliance
content.body: PropYouLike operates as a RERA-registered real estate marketing and channel partner. We facilitate property discovery, buyer assistance, and site visit coordination for residential projects listed on this website.

content.heading: RERA Registration Details
content.body: RERA Registration Number: PRM/KA/RERA/1251/310/AG/250811/005899. State: Karnataka.

content.heading: Role Clarification
content.body: PropYouLike is not the developer, promoter, or owner of the projects displayed on this website. All project-related information, including pricing, availability, images, and specifications, is provided by the respective developers and is subject to change.

content.heading: Verification
content.body: Users may independently verify the RERA registration details on the official Karnataka RERA portal at https://rera.karnataka.gov.in.
